answers.answer: There are many ladies on here that failed the 1 hr, but passed the 3 hr. I took the 2 hr first and passed. Don't give up hope. :)
I was shocked when I passed my 1 hr test with flying colors. I believe I got 131. I really thought I was going to fail just because my whole family has a history of getting diabetes while pregnant.

I failed my one hour. Had to take a 3 hour and my second hour was high, they determined I'm glucose intolerant but do not have gestational diabetes. Which means having to cut sugar and be put on a 2000 cal a day diet.
I failed the 1 hour by 6 points.I passed my 3 hour though :)A lot of women fail the 1 hour but pass the 3 hour.

question: So I just got a call saying a didn't pass my 1hr test I was suppose to get under 150 but I got 161Sooo now I have to take the 3hr test ...Did you ladies pass your first test ?
title: 1hr glucose test
